text: The Unsinkable Molly Brown may refer to: * Molly Brown, Margaret "Molly" Brown, American socialite, philanthropist, and activist who became famous as one of the survivors of the sinking of the RMS Titanic * The Unsinkable Molly Brown (musical), a 1960 musical based on the life of Margaret Brown * The Unsinkable Molly Brown (film), a 1964 film based on the musical
title: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
